author: mrglavas
msg: Fixes: Ensure we have a message formatter, and that the locator for the error reporter is the current entity scanner.
Errors reported had garbled messages and no locator info.

author: mrglavas
msg: Bug: Incorrect locator info was reported for errors in 1.1 external entities.
The locator must be replaced in the error reporter before parsing with the current entity scanner.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: venu
msg: Description : Checking in patch provided by Gopal Sharma. hasFeature() should return true for 3.0 version for XML and Core features.

author: venu
msg: Description : A simple patch to fix java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
